attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app was 🦋not it🦋 I was previously a trumpet, after using this app I am convinced I will no longer be a trumpet. After downloading, the walls in my room turned a bright orange and a tupé appeared on my fan. Terrifying. Gen Z, please think about your room’s feelings prior to downloading the app. We have all spent so much time decorating and the app just comes in and will ruin your aesthetic.

attributes.title: Terribly designed and lead by an imbecile
attributes.review: I just wanted to see what all the hype was about about this new app, but after downloading it I realized that it was the worst app I have ever downloaded. This app is the least useful piece of garbage I have ever seen. This should not be allowed. I am disgusted, I am horrified by the layout, and I do not think the content on the app is truthful in anyway.

attributes.title: DONT THINK ABOUT GETTING THIS
attributes.review: Omg when I downloaded this app horrible things started happening, my screen kept turning orange for some reason and saying trump 2020 all night long and that horrified me so deleted it and when I started eating Cheetos they didn’t taste normal and I think that has to do with the Cheeto as the president so now I am mad at trump for doing this so now I will not be voting for him 🧚‍♂️💅🏽🍊✨

attributes.title: ⚠️DONT GET THIS APP⚠️
attributes.review: This app when i first downloaded it seemed fine but a day or so went by and all of a sudden my phone was glitching out so so bad, i was confused so i took it to the apple store and they told me i had A VIRUS and when i asked how i got it they said most likely a beta software class 1 invasive virus from the TRUMP APP WAS THE CULPRET had to get my device completely wiped! do not get this app !!!

attributes.title: manny
attributes.review: Was scrolling through instagram and one of my fellow trump supporters put me on this app. I come to the app store and download it, but I came to the realization that it was making my phone glitch a lot. Considering this is the presidents app, I would’ve thought it would be glitch free, but boy was i wrong. Don’t recommend, wish I could give it 0 stars🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: i can’t believe this
attributes.review:
trump 2020! but this app is so difficult! i saw that these Gen z kids were wrighting these terrible reviews so I download it. and well i hate to say this, but they were right. this is the worst app ive ever downloaded. it might make me vote for the liberal 😔. anyways for all those Gen z kids.. keep trolling.

Go sign the manny flag petition make the conservatives act like “snowflakes”. 🧚🏼‍♀️✨🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️😌✨✨💕💕💫

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: As a supporter I thought that this app would be tremendously huge and as soon as it opened up the app crashed. I even went to check for updates , rebooted my phone, and got rid of and redownloaded the app several times and each time it kept crashing. Gosh I wish I help my president some more but if the app ain’t right then I can’t do it. Ugh 🙄

attributes.title: It’s glitching and listening to my conversations 😡
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible it keeps glitching and listening to things I’m saying then it stole all my private information and that’s the current hassle I’m going through right now , on top of all things this trump guy is trash he rapes people and pays them to keep quiet plus he hates minorities so #notrump2020-forever IMPEACH THE PEACH

attributes.title: App keeps crashing
attributes.review: I was very excited to show my support and get updates, but the app kept crashing and wouldn’t let me delete and redownload. I even tried restarting my phone, but my phone just crashed all together. Must need bugs fixed, but the app has an overall poor software.

attributes.title: Bye Fake News Media!
attributes.review: Direct connection to President Trump!  Fantastic app and you don’t have to sort through fake news articles!!!
